Good night everyone. I'm off to get my precious 4 hours of sleep.

::Zardus/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/WarMachine::

Zardus dives under autogun fire, a few shots hitting him in the shoulders. He 
growls as he flies back up, firing his plasma launcher at a few autguns.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike dodges a missile, a few autogun shots hitting him as he lands in 
the safety of the forest. He begins running of the Mafia base, dodging trees 
on the way.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica growls as shots hit him, sending him flying backwards, toward the 
canopy of the forest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
WarMachine roars, ignoring the autogun shots as a missile hits him, making 
another dent.

He fires two missiles from his shoulder missile launchers at the Mafia base, 
launching another kick at Mobster whole firing a plasma shot at him.
